headline: Paramount, Disney, Warner Bros. Discovery: Media earnings preview
summary: Upcoming earnings reports from Comcast (CMCSA), Disney (DIS), Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD), and Paramount (PARA) will offer investors insight into the media landscape. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Allie Canal and Citi managing director Jason Bazinet share what they're watching for as the media companies release results. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.
